name: Fructomania!
description:
A short rogue-like where you eat fruits to gain new abilities!
Fight your way through 2 stages against deadly food themed enemies and make your way to the final boss, the formidable waiter-turned high-society gentleman Mr. Richard Green!

This game was made for the Respawn Game Jam 2022 in the Unity Engine by "Team Plasma", which consists of :
Jeffrey Samuel - Developer (Gameplay and game backend)

Gabriel Abraham - Developer (UI and level design & procedural generation, Animation Integration, Concept Art)

Anusha Hitendra Borole - Artist (Character and weapon design)

Ashwini Kumar Biswal - Artist (Boss design and effects)
